Title: Authorizes Lawrence Ecker to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Lawrence Ecker to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system for his time as a state supreme court judge from approximately June 2021 through June 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Lawrence Ecker to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
